title: Strengthening Service Quality Practical Competencies: Advanced Cybersecurity Awareness Training for Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic network concepts and fundamental encryption technologies
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Identify cybersecurity threat types (phishing, ransomware, etc.) and explain defense strategies
Connect fundamental principles of encryption technology and security protocol applications to practical work scenarios
Analyze organizational security vulnerabilities and propose improvements using risk management frameworks

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
